description.value: Make a gore strike and compare the attack roll to all creatures and objects within 5 feet of the bull. For each creature hit by this strike, the creature is dealt @Damage[4d6[bludgeoning]] damage.
The chaos bull begins to shimmer and blur. On its next turn it may teleport to any point within 400 feet of itself at the start of its turn and then act normally.

With a sudden explosion of scalding steam from its nostrils, the chaos bull vents its built up heat. Those caught in the @Template[type:cone|distance:30] it produces take @Damage[4d6[fire]|options:area-damage] with a @Check[reflex|dc:27|basic] save. It can't use Steam Release again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Like normal objects, a brass chaos bull has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage it takes by an amount equal to the Hardness. Once a brass chaos bull is reduced to less than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks and its Armor Class is reduced to 21.
